name: Endgame
description: This app integrates with Endgame to execute investigative and corrective actions

actions.description: Validate the asset configuration for connectivity using supplied configuration
List all the endpoints/sensors configured on the device

limit.description: Maximum number of endpoints to retrieve (Default: 50)

actions.description: List all the users configured on the device
Launch a search for a specific user session
actions.verbose:
This action will launch a search for a specific user's sessions on the given endpoints.

The user parameter can take a list of comma-separated usernames.

actions.description: Launch a search for a specific registry
actions.verbose:
This action will launch a search for a specific registry on the given endpoints.

The key parameter can take a list of comma-separated registry key names.

This action only supports Windows endpoints.

actions.description: Launch a search for a specific network connection
actions.verbose:
This action will launch a search for connections to a remote IP on the given endpoints.

The ip parameter can take a list of comma-separated IPs.

actions.description: Launch a search for a specific process
actions.verbose:
This action will launch a search for a process on the given endpoints.

The process parameter can take a process name or a list of comma-separated hashes (MD5, SHA1, or SHA256).

example_values: 44 51 ad 37 17 cf a2 23 71 ff bc 07 df 13 e6 5d
Symantec Time Stamping Services CA - G2
0e cf f4 38 c8 fe bf 35 6e 04 d8 6a 98 1b 1a 50
Symantec Time Stamping Services Signer - G4

actions.description: Launch a search for a specific file
actions.verbose:
This action will launch a search for a file on the given endpoints in the given directory.

The file parameter can take a file name regex or a hash (MD5, SHA1, or SHA256). It can also take any combination of the aforementioned in a comma-separated list (e.g: 6383522c180badc4e1d5c30a5c4f4913,*.exe,62a30e96459b694f7b22d730c460a65cd2ebaaca)
